short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivity tool for Salesforce admins and devs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SF Explorer brings a number of setup enhancements with a focus on usability/innovation:
✔️ Interactive Notebooks (jupyter equivalent)
✔️ GitHub and GitLab integration
✔️ Excel like capabilities (pivot, sort, grouping,...)
✔️ An enhanced object manager
✔️ Different query tools such as SOQL, SOSL or GraphQL (chaining it is supported)
✔️ Record usage capabilities
✔️ Record comparison capabilities
✔️ Org security analysis
✔️ OpenAPI generation
✔️ DataCloud support
✔️ ChatGPT/Einstein native integration (optional)
✔️ and more...

____________________
Privacy information:
Unless you use the chatGPT feature (with your own token) - no data is sent anywhere - the request are only going between you and the salesforce servers. If you use chatGPT, we use the openAI public API with simple prompts. You can also use einstein
Google Analytics is used to capture behavior information such as used features
____________________

Visit https://info.sf-explorer.com/ or https://www.youtube.com/@SFExplorer for more info 


Term of use: https://info.sf-explorer.com/docs/intro#term-of-use
